content: > free blog version 1 etsy listing 2 and > yarnandy shop 3 about the pattern ----------------- this is a beginner tunisian crochet pattern for a summer top with thin straps it is worked bottom-up for the body in a front and back panel in either a cropped or a full length waist shaping is optional instructions and an example are given for custom waist shaping the two pieces are seamed and the armholes and neckband are finished off after seaming an optional ribbing or small lacy border is added on the bottom you can work in one color in stripes or even insert a graph within the front or back panel the pattern is written out for all 12 sizes and includes ease 10 cm or 4 at bust and high hip instructions for a cropped version are also included you will choose a size based on the finished garment measurements and follow only the instructions for that size use the attached guide or linked tutorials to customize the fit what you get ------------ there are 3 files included in your purchase * one file has all the instructions and other details it includes schematics and photo tutorials the instructions are print-friendly * one file is the easy read or low vision version of this images have captions all the text is large and easy to read including the tables with measurements see below for exact specifications * a guide for improving the fit of your garments that you can use for other patterns as well measurements ------------ the pattern comes with 12 fully written sizes ranging in bust between 88-180 cm or 35 25-72 you can easily customize the length of the body by adding or skipping row the measurements in the tables attached see images are garment measurements and they should all be larger than your body measurements at the same points skill level ----------- beginner - you will work mainly with the tunisian modified simple stitch tunisian reverse purl stitches are used for the optional bottom ribbing materials --------- yarn size 2 or sport weight cotton or cotton blend yarn at 155-170 meters per 50 grams see below for length requirements per size hook - tunisian crochet hook with cable or straight 5 mm or hook size that gets you gauge 3 5 mm regular crochet hook for seams tapestry needle scissors tape measure stitch markers tools for blocking iron with steam or other steamer blocking mats and pins approximate total length of required yarn per size **cropped version ** * in meters -
